pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī sāvatthiyaṃ kulūpako hoti, bahukāni kulāni upasaṅkamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī matapatikā abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.4: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena tassā itthiyā nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.5: Atha kho sā itthī yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho taṃ itthiṃ āyasmā udāyī dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṃsesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.7: Atha kho sā itthī āyasmatā udāyinā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṃsitā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.10: “Na kho te, bhagini, amhākaṃ dullabhā yadidaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.11: Api ca yo amhākaṃ dullabho taṃ dehī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.17: ovarakaṃ pavisitvā sāṭakaṃ nikkhipitvā mañcake uttānā nipajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.18: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī yena sā itthī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.21: Atha kho sā itthī ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.23: Ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.24: Natthi imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ natthi imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, kuto imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ kuto imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.25: apagatā ime sāmaññā apagatā ime brahmaññā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.26: Kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī maṃ sāmaṃ methunadhammaṃ yācitvā, ‘ko imaṃ vasalaṃ duggandhaṃ āmasissatī’ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.1.27: Kiṃ me pāpakaṃ kiṃ me duggandhaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.3: kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī imissā sāmaṃ methunadhammaṃ yācitvā, ‘ko imaṃ vasalaṃ duggandhaṃ āmasissatī’ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkamissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.4: Kiṃ imissā pāpakaṃ kiṃ imissā duggandhaṃ, kassāyaṃ kena hāyatī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tāsaṃ itthīnaṃ ujjhāyantīnaṃ khiyyantīnaṃ vipācentīnaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.6: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.7: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.8: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.9: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.10: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, udāyi, mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.13: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.14: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.15: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:1.2.19: “Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya— ‘etadaggaṃ, bhagini, pāricariyānaṃ yā mādisaṃ sīlavantaṃ kalyāṇadhammaṃ brahmacāriṃ etena dhammena paricareyyāti methunupasaṃhitena’, saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.8: rattampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, duṭṭhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ, mūḷhampi cittaṃ vipariṇataṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.9: Api ca rattaṃ cittaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetaṃ vipariṇatanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.11: manussitthī, na yakkhī, na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Viññū paṭibalā subhāsitadubbhāsitaṃ duṭṭhullāduṭṭhullaṃ ājānituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.15: attano kāmaṃ attano hetuṃ attano adhippāyaṃ attano pāricariyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.17: etaṃ aggaṃ etaṃ seṭṭhaṃ etaṃ mokkhaṃ etaṃ uttamaṃ etaṃ pavaraṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.19: khattiyī vā brāhmaṇī vā vessī vā suddī vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.21: khattiyaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā vessaṃ vā suddaṃ vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.23: pāṇātipātā paṭivirataṃ, adinnādānā paṭivirataṃ, musāvādā paṭivirataṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:2.27: tena ca sīlena tena ca brahmacariyena kalyāṇadhammo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.1: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.2: Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.7: Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.8: Paṇḍako ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.9: Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.14: Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.22: Bhikkhu ca naṃ tiracchānagatassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.23: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.24: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.26: Itthī ca paṇḍako ca ubhinnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:3.1.27: Bhikkhu ca naṃ ubhinnaṃ santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:4.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā vijāyinī itthī kulūpakaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:4.3.8: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss4:4.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā itthī kulūpakaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca—
